page.title: 07Clatto Reservoir
page.content: {Clatto}was opened as a Country Park and watersports area in June 1979. One really valuable service provided by the park is the Ranger Service. The Rangers are there to give advice and help, to provide information, to look after the park and its visitors and to guard against all risks to safety. The Rangers know a lot about the history of the park, about the water system and about the animals and plants as well, of course, as all the water sports. Available at{Clatto}are windsurfing at Â£2 per hour/Â£5 per three hours; canoeing and rowing at 30p per half hour; sailing at Â£4.50 and fishing at 50p per day (though you are not allowed to take the fish home).
